full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 88 of 261 1249
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 Q. And you continued maintaining contact with some of them; correct?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. You would be on chat groups with them for a period of time?
4 A. I actually was only on the chat group for a very small amount of time. I left the chat group.
5 Q. But nonetheless, for at least a small period of time, you were involved in the chat group with other individuals, other women who claimed they had been abused by Jeffrey Epstein; correct?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. And you had also maintained contact with an individual named Virginia Roberts; correct?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. And you and Virginia Roberts are represented by the same attorney, Bradley Edwards?
10 A. I don't -- I don't know who represents Virginia.
11 Q. You never have spoken to her about that at all?
12 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor.
13 THE COURT: Grounds?
14 MS. POMERANTZ: Hearsay.
15 THE COURT: Sustained.
16 Q. You're aware that your attorney wrote a book about your case and the case of others while he has been representing you; correct?
17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018425

1 Q. And you continued maintaining contact with some of them; correct?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. You would be on chat groups with them for a period of time?
4 A. I actually was only on the chat group for a very small amount of time. I left the chat group.
5 Q. But nonetheless, for at least a small period of time, you were involved in the chat group with other individuals, other women who claimed they had been abused by Jeffrey Epstein; correct?
